title: Facing a major issue with my Pbe Login hoping for a rioters help.
body: I havnt played let alone update my pbe launcher for over i think a year well today i felt like getting on and playing the new champ but unfortunately when i tried to log in with my password and all that from my live account i cant login im not sure if it is a separate account or not but if it is then i have another issue i changed my email recently and the old email account is one i cant access seeing as how i can not remember the email of it let alone the password i had set for said email so i was hoping if anything is their a way for me to change anything about my pbe account to login to it or if theirs a way a rioter can help me with my issue as in reset my pbe account or at least change its old email to my current one so i can access it in some way.

replies.body: Your PBE login is unique and should be separately from your live account login details. I recommend submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist you in recovering your account.
